info.name: P&B
info.description:
The theme for light mode eliminates the traditional colors and chromatic tones of the site, as well as the logo, icons, buttons, text areas, etc. I tried to bring modifications that we don't find in other styles anymore.
This theme I created for Quora brings the elegance of black and white and especially the readability that every platform with a large amount of text requires.
info.additionalInfo: To work, IT IS NECESSARY TO ACTIVATE THE LIGHT MODE, which can be done by clicking on the button.

author.name: C h a c o n _ A l e x
